# Canadian Criminal Intelligence System (CCIS) Modernization Project
## Request for Proposal with Supply Arrangement Holders
### Solicitation Letter Number: 202401691
#### Tender Status: Expired

#### Project Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires professional services to support the modernization of the Canadian Criminal Intelligence System (CCIS). The CCIS Modernization project aims to replace the current system with a modernized IT solution that enables automated business processes, advanced data analytics tools, and enhances collaboration within the Criminal Intelligence community.

### Tender Information
- **Solicitation Method**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 16, 2023, at 14:00:00 (AST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 6, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: December 5, 2024
- **Regions of Opportunity**: World
- **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Procurement Category**: SRV

### Security Requirements
- **Security Requirement**: SRCL #102873
- **Minimum Corporate Security Required**: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
- **Minimum Resource Security Required**: Enhanced Reliability

### Trade Agreements
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others.

### Contact Information
- **Contracting Authority**: Stacy Seme, stacy.seme@rcmp-grc.gc.ca, (613) 327-2713

### Submission Requirements
Bidders must submit a proposal for all resource categories. The work is currently being performed by S.I. Systems, Veritaaq, and TPG Technologies. 

### Documents
The solicitation document can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20819/202401691---ccis-npp-%28en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20819/202401691---ccis-npp-%28en.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20819/202401691---snrc-npp-%28fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca
